Name: VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry (Base Pack)
About the game: Train your professional skills in GWPro VR trainings safely and in full correspondence with international standards! This bundle includes: - Work At Height VR Training - Confined Space Entry VR Training - Lockout Tagout (LOTO) VR Training - Fire Safety VR Training (Office and Hangar) - Hot Work VR Training All trainings consist of 3 modes: Study, Training, Exam that provide step-by-step control of all VR activities. Voice-over and visual guides included. VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry were developed for professionals by professionals (including NEBOSH certified HSE). It is suitable for a wide variety of workers. Send you feedback and ideas to improve training modules.
